sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE) APP_PRT_AT_KOR_NM , E.FEE_TP , P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.FEE_TP) FEE_TP_NM , E.FISCAL_YR , E.SOC_NO , E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE) EXMP_AGENT_NM , E.USE_NO , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER@YGPA_P2MGR(E.CALL_LETTER) CALL_LETTER , DECODE(E.FEE_TP, 'R1', P2MGR.SF_ARVL_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.VSSL_KEY, E.YR, E.SER_NO), 'R2', P2MGR.SF_ARVL_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.VSSL_KEY, E.YR, E.SER_NO), 'R3', P2MGR.SF_ARVL_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.VSSL_KEY, E.YR, E.SER_NO), 'L0', P2MGR.SF_ARVL_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.VSSL_KEY, E.YR, E.SER_NO), P2MGR.SF_VSSL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.VSSL_KEY)) VSSL_NM , E.SER_NO , E.YR , DECODE(E.FEE_TP, 'L0', DECODE(E.IN_OUT, '1', '외항입항', '2', '외항출항', '3', '내항입항', '4','내항출항',''), DECODE(E.IN_OUT, '1', '외항', '2', '내항', '') ) IN_OUT_NM , NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0) EXMP_AMNT , E.FAC_CODE , E.FAC_SUB_CODE , P2MGR.SF_FACIL_NM@YGPA_P2MGR(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.FAC_CODE, E.FAC_SUB_CODE) FACIL_NM , TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BILL_DT , NVL(E.STANDARD_FEE, 0) STANDARD_FEE , E.REAL_TN , NVL(A.EXMP_ACC, 0) EXMP_ACC , DECODE(A.RATE_GUBUN,'1','과거','현재') RATE_GUBUN FROM SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E INNER JOIN SOC_APPLY_F@YGPA_P2MGR A ON E.PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND E.CMPL_YR = A.CMPL_YR AND E.CONST_NO = A.CONST_NO AND E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND E.APP_AGENT_CODE = A.APP_AGENT_CODE AND E.USE_NO = A.USE_NO WHERE E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND E.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode#
AND E.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr#
AND E.CONST_NO = #sConstNo#
AND E.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode#
AND E.FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE(#sBillDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND E.BILL_DT < TO_DATE(#sBillDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
ORDER BY E.CMPL_YR, E.CONST_NO ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT , SUM(NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0)) SUM_EXMP_AMNT FROM SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E INNER JOIN SOC_APPLY_F@YGPA_P2MGR A ON E.PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND E.CMPL_YR = A.CMPL_YR AND E.CONST_NO = A.CONST_NO AND E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = A.APP_PRT_AT_CODE AND E.APP_AGENT_CODE = A.APP_AGENT_CODE AND E.USE_NO = A.USE_NO WHERE E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND E.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode#
AND E.CMPL_YR = #sCmplYr#
AND E.CONST_NO = #sConstNo#
AND E.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAppAgentCode#
AND E.FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE(#sBillDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND E.BILL_DT < TO_DATE(#sBillDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
